spec_data.Name: salt-minion
spec_data.Description:
The Salt minion is the agent component of Salt. It listens for instructions
from the master, runs jobs, and returns results back to the master.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 15 Aug 2017 01:45:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Client component for Salt, a parallel remote execution system
